lines.text: Mila hai kisika jhumka, hare hare neem ka... Found is a earring, green as the color of mint leaves...
O sajana, barkha bahar aai, ras ki puhar lai, ankhiyon me pyar lai... O sweetheart, it is raining, a shower of nectar, love in eyes...

Kya hawa chali re baba ruth badli, shor hai gali gali, sau sau chuyen khaike billy haj ko chali... The change in the winds have changed the season, after eating hundreds of mice, the cat has decided to go on a holy pilgrimage...
